caption.p:
Taylor diagrams of ( a) all model results and ( b) model results of standardized deviations smaller than 2.5 for the northern extratropical forest carbon mass at various forest fraction thresholds ( F
f ) ranging from 0.0 to 0.9. Model numbers represent the CMIP5 models including (1) BNU-ESM, (2) HadGEM2-CC, (3) HadGEM2-ES, (4) IPSL-CM5A-LR, (5) IPSL-CM5A-MR, (6) IPSL-CM5B-LR, (7) MIROC-ESM, and (8) MIROC-ESM-CHEM. [Maps were made using the NCAR Command Language v6.4.0 software, 10.5065/D6WD3XH5].
